Text:
Making Subtitles in your language

1) Find subtitles in English or other languages (subbiee.com & opensubtitles.org & sub-titles.net)
2) Translate them into your language using http://translate.google.com
3) Copy & Paste the text in a new file using Notepad
4) Correct the text in your language for any grammatical mistake
5) Replace the tag -> with -->
6) Save the file in format: .srt
@FatherBallbag I'd like to go camping with you.
